TopicTitle: kerbal space program has the desire to kill me.

Articles.Content: I can't seem to attach satellites to the interior of my cargo ship, and the cargo ship has the exact amount of space for it to be in; I hope KSP doesn't make me have to load cargo into the ship manually.
If you post a screenshot of the craft that you're working on it will help people to understand the problem that you're having.
If the problem you're having is that it's insisting on attaching radially and ignoring the node in the cargo bay, hold alt (if you're on Windows) to disable radial attachment.

Impossible to know without pics but, if the sat your using is a subassembly or separate ship you're merging with the cargo ship, the root part might be your issue; which you could solve with the re-root tool. A bit more info would make it easier to help you.
